description:
Get out and explore. Wherever your 2-wheeled adventures take you, the Edge Explore 2 will keep you on track, and tell you all about how you got there. Updated with an intuitive touch-based interface and preloaded with free maps, route planning for your next ride, or next tour, is nice and simple. Should you take a wrong turn, or a curiosity fueled detour, the Explore 2 will navigate you back to your route. Detailed mapping and routing on your Edge means you get to save your phone’s battery for pictures, and finding that next great eatery. When connected to your phone via the free Garmin Connect™ app, the Trendline™ feature will show you the most popular routes, anywhere Garmin users ride. Connect also lets you use your favourite fitness apps, receive notifications, download training plans and workouts, review activities, and even keep an eye on the weather.

  • Free global maps, with North America preloaded and more regions downloadable, for turn-by-turn routing to local points of interest, including cycling specific features like bike shops
  • Point of interest navigation lets you search for places like restaurants, attractions, hospitals, accommodation and more
  • Popularity routing uses Garmin Connect’s database of rider’s routes and tracks to let you ride local, anywhere you go
  • ClimbPro™ mode breaks down the climbs in your ride, letting you know the grade, the total ascent, remaining ascent and elevation profile, so you can pace yourself
  • LiveTrack share your course with contacts
  • GroupTrack displays the location and telemetry of contacts using compatible Garmin devices, you can even send pre-set messages within your group
  • Compatible with Varia™ radar units (sold separately), allowing you to keep an eye out for vehicles approaching from behind
  • inReach® compatibility provides messaging and SOS support when you ride takes you away from cell signal
  • Find my Edge feature let’s you know if your Edge loses its connection to your phone. Should your Edge fall off, you get a lost-connection alert with location and exact GPS coordinates. Once in Bluetooth™ range you can trigger an alarm on your device, letting you know exactly where it is
  • Physiological metrics includes VO2 max estimate, recovery time, intensity minutes, fitness age, and more (some features require not included heartrate chest strap)
  • Incident detection uses accelerometers to detect accident and uses you phone to send a signal to predefined emergency contacts
  • Bike alarm mode adds a bit of peace of mind to bathroom stops, water stops and anywhere you need to refuel or de-fuel, sounding a loud, shrill, attention getting alarm if your bike is touched
  • A powerful, internal antenna connects to 3 different satellite constellations, GPS, GLONASS and Galileo. Multiple networks, combined with satellite position caching, give you a fast connection and a strong GPS signal
  • Shimano Steps e-bike integration displays, range, battery status, gearing, and more
  • Trainer support provides ride data during your indoor training sessions, and you can even ride previous routes when paired with a compatible smart trainer
  • Connect IQ support allows you to download apps, templates, data fields, and other features
  • In the box: Edge Explore 2, standard mount, USB-C cable, tether and manuals
name: Garmin Edge Explore 2
